summary: Adds comic books and stuff to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center] [b] Comic Shop description [/b]
This mod is now basically whatever comic related mods I make.

[b] All files are independent.
[/b] Use [i] one [/i] or [i] all [/i].
When using multiple comic book versions say no to update and yes to overwrite. They share some resources.

[color=yellow] [b] Requests welcome! [/b] [/color]

[b] Spawn book animation [/b]
Replaces any instance of people reading books with people reading Spawn #50

[b] Comic Shop Lite 2.4 [/b]
Can be run with or without the others with no conflicts. Twenty more comics. They are skill books. Added a limited edition foil cover comic for the first fifty downloads! New image format should ensure no pink pages.
Deadpool
Spawn
Spiderman
Wolverine

[b] Comic Shop Lite 2.3 [/b]
Can be run with or without the others with no conflicts. Fourteen more comics. They are skill books....mostly. One comic is particularly lude. Adults only. Textures updated. Texture paths updated.
Batman
Superman
Satan's Sodomy Baby
A few classic penny comics

[b] AvP comics Lite 2.3 [/b]
Can be run with or without the others with no conflicts. Twenty-two more comics. Find them in Belethor's. They are skill books. Updated textures. Texture paths updated.
Aliens vs. Predator 0-4
Aliens vs. Predator-Deadliest of the Species 1-12
Aliens vs. Predator-War 0-4

[b] Spawn armor [/b]
Dremora are now hellspawn! Daedric armor is given a Spawn retex along with the wooden mask.
The cape is [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32282] Flowing Cape With Physics by agentspoon and aoxer [/url]

[b] Supergirl costume [/b]
Um....it's my Supergirl costume.

[b] AvP Comic [/b]
Adds a comic book and some torn pages to Breezehome.

I like AvP. I was using my Machiko character when I made the original for my self. I put it out there for you. Since then I've gone a little overboard. They are mostly for ambiance. Exist in world and inventory. Skill books, too.

If you really like Predator, or use [url= http//skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24543] Predator Lost Tribes [/url] http//skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24543, check out one of my other mods.
[url=//skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28531] Predator Shout and Sounds [/url] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28531

Have a good time, and remember. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eNr0WXQ3Ho4] If it bleeds, we can kill it. [/url]

[credits]

Bethesda
FOX
H.R. Giger
Stan Winston
Dark Horse Comics
Marvel Comics
D.C. Comics
Image Comics
Gimp
Nexus
Me
Thanks to maskraider for help debugging [/center]


[center] [b] My Mods [/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33925] Supergirl Costume [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33652] Facial expression Illustrated book [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32365] Evil book replacer for reading animations [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28806] Custom Races Utility [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28531] Predator Shouts and Sounds [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27678] Magic is light [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27330] Deathlight [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27316] Repulsor Beam [/url] [/center]
author: MurdermiesteR
